query:
INSERT INTO packages (name, slug, description, price, duration, destination, category, highlights, amenities, image, featured, published) VALUES
('Luxury Island Escape', 'luxury-island-escape', 'Experience ultimate luxury with overwater bungalows and world-class amenities', 250000, '5 days', 'Maafushi', 'luxury', JSON_ARRAY('5-star resort', 'Spa treatments', 'Gourmet dining'), JSON_ARRAY('Accommodation', 'Meals', 'Transfers'), '/images/luxury-package.jpg', 1, 1),
('Diving Adventure', 'diving-adventure', 'Explore vibrant coral reefs and encounter exotic marine life', 180000, '4 days', 'Gulhi', 'diving-snorkeling', JSON_ARRAY('Guided dives', 'PADI certification', 'Snorkeling'), JSON_ARRAY('Diving equipment', 'Boat transfers', 'Meals'), '/images/diving-package.jpg', 1, 1),
('Island Hopping Tour', 'island-hopping-tour', 'Visit multiple islands and experience diverse cultures and landscapes', 150000, '6 days', 'Multiple Islands', 'island-hopping', JSON_ARRAY('4 island visits', 'Local guides', 'Beach activities'), JSON_ARRAY('Transfers', 'Accommodation', 'Meals'), '/images/island-hopping.jpg', 1, 1),
('Romantic Honeymoon Package', 'romantic-honeymoon', 'Perfect getaway for newlyweds with private beach and sunset dinners', 350000, '7 days', 'Dhigurah', 'luxury', JSON_ARRAY('Private villa', 'Sunset cruise', 'Couples spa'), JSON_ARRAY('Luxury accommodation', 'All meals', 'Activities'), '/images/honeymoon-package.jpg', 1, 1),
('Budget Backpacker', 'budget-backpacker', 'Affordable island adventure with shared accommodations and local experiences', 60000, '3 days', 'Huraa', 'solo-travel', JSON_ARRAY('Guesthouse stay', 'Local food', 'Beach time'), JSON_ARRAY('Basic accommodation', 'Breakfast', 'Ferry transfers'), '/images/backpacker-package.jpg', 0, 1),
('Surfing Paradise', 'surfing-paradise', 'Ride the waves at some of the best surf breaks in the Indian Ocean', 120000, '5 days', 'Thulusdhoo', 'water-sports', JSON_ARRAY('Surfing lessons', 'Board rental', 'Beginner-friendly'), JSON_ARRAY('Accommodation', 'Meals', 'Equipment'), '/images/surfing-package.jpg', 1, 1),
('Wellness Retreat', 'wellness-retreat', 'Rejuvenate with yoga, meditation, and holistic wellness treatments', 200000, '6 days', 'Himmafushi', 'relaxation', JSON_ARRAY('Daily yoga', 'Meditation', 'Spa treatments'), JSON_ARRAY('Yoga classes', 'Healthy meals', 'Accommodation'), '/images/wellness-package.jpg', 1, 1),
('Photography Expedition', 'photography-expedition', 'Capture stunning landscapes and wildlife with professional photography guides', 160000, '4 days', 'Kaashidhoo', 'adventure', JSON_ARRAY('Professional guides', 'Sunrise shoots', 'Editing workshop'), JSON_ARRAY('Accommodation', 'Meals', 'Guide services'), '/images/photography-package.jpg', 0, 1),
('Family Fun Package', 'family-fun-package', 'Create lasting memories with activities suitable for all ages', 140000, '5 days', 'Maafushi', 'family-adventures', JSON_ARRAY('Water sports', 'Snorkeling', 'Beach games'), JSON_ARRAY('Family villa', 'All meals', 'Activities'), '/images/family-package.jpg', 1, 1),
('Eco-Tourism Adventure', 'eco-tourism-adventure', 'Sustainable travel experience with focus on marine conservation', 130000, '4 days', 'Gulhi', 'adventure', JSON_ARRAY('Conservation work', 'Nature walks', 'Local community'), JSON_ARRAY('Eco-lodge', 'Organic meals', 'Activities'), '/images/eco-package.jpg', 0, 1);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute INSERT INTO packages (name, slug, description, price, duration, destination, category, highlights, amenities, image, featured, published) VALUES
